content: a quick and fun corner to corner project with a little bit of colorwork to make a heart pattern in the middle the blog post with the pattern includes the pattern along with a written step-by-step tutorial on how to do corner to corner crochet there is also a chart written instructions and a captioned video available for this pattern note that gauge is not terribly important i do recommend using a cotton yarn for dishcloths to get that good scrubby surface
